name: Don's Github Homepage
body:
### [ridetracker](https://github.com/dpb1857/ridetracker)

A Python/Django based webapp for slicing and dicing the results from PBP 2011.
See: [pbpresults.bikeaholics.org](http://pbpresults.bikeaholics.org).

Don't miss the animated playback [HERE](http://pbpresults.bikeaholics.org/pbp2011/histogram)! Track my progress by entering the number 4484 into the "Track Frame" box.

### [puzzles](https://github.com/dpb1857/puzzles)

Miscellaneous puzzles.

### [ServerMgr](https://github.com/dpb1857/ServerMgr)

An oldish Python package I worked on to ease the programmatic management of external services. You can see the docs [HERE](https://dpb1857.github.io/ServerMgr).

### [python-mingw](https://github.com/dpb1857/python-mingw)

Some time ago, I wanted to build Python on windows using the mingw compiler and cygwin. It was somewhat entertaining, but eventually you get tired of banging your head on the rocky shores of Windows. 

### [synced](https://github.com/dpb1857/synced)

Not much to see here, I keep some stuff that I want to sync across my home directory on different machines; dot files, elisp, some puppet stuff.

### [donbennett](https://github.com/dpb1857/donbennett)

Puppet configuration for servers I operate.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
